desc1: As a UX Architect at Core Cognitics, I lead the user experience strategy across multiple digital platforms, including SaaS products and enterprise systems. My role spans the complete design lifecycle — from research and conceptualization to architecture planning, wireframing, and validation — ensuring alignment between user needs and business objectives.
bullets: Defined and implemented UX design systems, standards, and scalable best practices across products.
Designed end-to-end user flows, information architectures, and structured wireframes to support complex, multi-role systems.
Conducted stakeholder workshops, interviews, and user research to uncover insights and identify usability challenges.
Collaborated closely with product managers, developers, and business analysts to ensure technical feasibility and consistency.
Translated complex business requirements into intuitive, user-centered digital experiences.
Supported development teams with detailed documentation and interaction specifications.
desc2: This role strengthened my ability to merge business logic with design thinking — creating experiences that are strategically aligned, scalable, and functionally robust, not just visually appealing.

bullets: Designed user-centered interfaces for analytics dashboards and enterprise applications.

desc2: During my tenure, I strengthened my expertise in enterprise UX, data visualization interfaces, and scalable design systems. Working across remote and on-site environments enhanced my ability to collaborate across distributed teams while maintaining high design quality and delivery standards.
